libro.resumen: Appropriate for courses titled Computer Networking or Introduction to Networking at both the undergraduate and graduate level in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, CIS, MIS, and Business Departments.

En esta nueva edición se agregó un capítulo independiente sobre arquitecturas para reflejar el progreso que se ha dado en la organización de sistemas distribuidos. Otra diferencia importante es que ahora existe mucho más material acerca de sistemas descentralizados, en especial sobre computación de igual a igual (peer-to-peer)
libro.idioma: Espaniol 2007 Pearson California EUA sistemasDistribuidos.jpg T401,M401

libro.resumen: Database System Concepts by Silberschatz, Korth and Sudarshan is now in its 6th edition and is one of the cornerstone texts of database education.
libro.idioma: Ingles 2007 MCGraw Hill California EUA database.jpg A001,K002

libro.resumen: JavaScript was written to give readers an accurate, concise examination of JavaScript objects and their supporting nuances, such as complex values, primitive values, scope, inheritance, the head object, and more.
libro.idioma: Ingles 2017 Create Space Boston EUA jscript.jpg J223
